#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int x,y,z;
        cin>>x>>y>>z;

        int number = 1000*x+100*y+10*z;
        int  a=9,b=9;
        int flag=0;

        while(a>=0 && b>=0)
        {
            int number1 = number + a*10000 + b;
            if(number1%n==0)
            {
                flag=1;
                cout<<a<<" "<<b<<" "<<number1/n<<endl;
                break;
            }
            if(b==0)
            {
                a--;
                b=9;
            }
            else
            {
                b--;
            }
        }
        if(flag==0)
            cout<<"0"<<endl;
    }


    return 0;
}
